marketplaces.name: luebken-claude-plugins
marketplaces.description: A collection of Claude plugins developed by Matthias Luebken.

files.README.md:
# Luebken Claude Plugins

In Claude Code:
```sh
/plugin marketplace add luebken/claude-plugins
/plugin install validate-md@luebken-claude-plugins
```

plugins.name: validate-md
plugins.description: Validates markdown files with YAML frontmatter against JSON Schema definitions.
